dmca.title: Phone Sex Ads in Google Groups Allegedly Infringing (#1)
dmca.body:
SE COMMUNICATIONS LLC

March 31, 2004

Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Dear Sir or Madam: (Sent via Facsimile [private] and US mail)

1. The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears under dates 
February 10, 2004 and March 1, 2004 on the site www.dirty-little-secrets.com The text was published at groups.google.com on the above mentioned dates. The message ids are as follows:

Message-ID: <20040210112233.21852.00001928@mb-m06.aol.com> 
Message-ID: <20040301174433.25108.00000533@mb-m07.aol.com>

2. The offending material appears within groups.google.com

Message-ID: <630af37l480e4l905a426ac97511e5l7@news.teranews.com> 
Message-ID: <daa20ee40542dd79O31e198001e84579@news.teranews.com>

3. I am the copyright owner and my contact information is [private]

4. The advertised number [private] has been shut off and the 
whois information on the site advertised www-phone-sex-guestbook.com 
is bogus e.g., contact number is 1-xxx-xxx-xxxx.

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

[private]
Chief Executive Manager

[private] - WASHINCTON, DC - 20013
PHONE: [private]
